definition: (pet name for a baby or small child)

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天气里，徒步旅行甚是惬意。

sentences.english: Just about. It's still drizzling a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 差不多了，只是下着毛毛细雨。

sentences.english: The shower head drizzled water on my head.
sentences.chinese: 莲蓬头把水像下毛毛雨似的洒在我头上。

sentences.english: Lynxes are known for the black tufts of fur on the tips of their ears.
sentences.chinese: 猞猁最明显的特性是它们耳朵尖上的一撮毛毛。

sentences.english: Finally let me stroke her fur.
sentences.chinese: 终于让我抚弄她的毛毛。

sentences.english: Faldan could see that, in fact, the tree was full of small, hungry caterpillars.
sentences.chinese: 福达果真看到树上爬满了瘦小而饥饿的毛毛虫。

sentences.english: CLIFF:When you see a Fuzzy Wuzzy bear ask him to let down his hair.
sentences.chinese: 当你看见一只毛毛熊就请他放下他的头发。

sentences.english: It may have drizzled during the night.
It was drizzling when the train pulled into the station .
sentences.chinese: 火车进站时，天正下着毛毛雨。

sentences.english: These young fellows are all in a flurry.
sentences.chinese: 他们全都是一些毛毛楞楞的小伙子。

sentences.english: The shower tailed off into a drizzle .
sentences.chinese: 阵雨越来越小，最后变成了毛毛雨。

sentences.english: He was really getting tired of the catcalls and the manhandling.
sentences.chinese: 他真是受够那些嘘声和毛毛躁躁的骚扰了。

sentences.english: The soft rain swelled into a storm.
sentences.chinese: 毛毛细雨变成了暴风雨。

sentences.english: Dudu bear goes to Maomao cat's home.
sentences.chinese: 嘟嘟熊到毛毛球家串门。

definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
